page.title: 19RESERVOIR
page.content: {BANGOUR RESERVOIR}IS A PRIVATE RESERVOIR,IT SUPPLIES WATER TO { {BANGOUR VILLAGE HOSPITAL.}IT HAS { {PRIVATE FISHING REGULATIONS.}IT IS SURROUNDED BY TREES AND INTERESTING PLANTS.ON ONE SIDE IT HAS THE REMAINS OF A BRICK HOUSE.THERE IS A SMALL PIER WHICH STANDS OVER THE RESERVOIR AND IT IS INTERESTING TO VISITORS.THERE IS A MIXTURE OF CONIFEROUS AND DECIDUOUS TREES SURROUNDING THE RESERVOIR.THERE ARE LOTS OF WATER LILIES IN THE WATER AND BROWN AND RAINBOW TROUT AS WELL THE RESERVOIR IS A NICE PLACE FOR A FAMILY OUTING AND WE THINK THAT THE LOCAL AUTHORITY SHOULD TAKE IT OVER AND TURN IT INTO A {COUNTRY PARK}WHERE PEOPLE CAN GO AND PICNIC.
